body: Kerry's Eastern Europe Travel Blog on About.com writes briefly about a new museum that opened in Tallinn earlier this month: located on the top floor of Hotel Viru, it "preserves the equipment and rooms the KGB used to eavesdrop and spy on individuals for the first 20 years of the hotel's existence."

title: Estonia: KGB Museum at Tallinn's Hotel Viru

sentence: Kerry's Eastern Europe Travel Blog on About.com

writes briefly about a new museum that opened in Tallinn earlier this month: located on the top floor of Hotel Viru, it "preserves the equipment and rooms the KGB used to eavesdrop and spy on individuals for the first 20 years of the hotel's existence."
